properties.areaDesc: Burns Harbor to Michigan City IN; Calumet Harbor IL to Gary IN; Gary to Burns Harbor IN
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 6 at 2:35PM CST until January 8 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a Small Craft
Advisory, which is in effect from noon Tuesday to noon CST
Wednesday.

* WINDS...West northwest to 30 kt, with occasional gale force
gusts to 35 kt in the evening.

* SIGNIFICANT WAVES...to 8 ft.

* OCCASIONAL WAVES...to 10 ft.
properties.instruction:
A Small Craft Advisory means that wind speeds of 21 to 33 knots
are expected to produce hazardous wave conditions to small craft.
Inexperienced mariners...especially those operating smaller
vessels should avoid navigating in these conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TUESDAY TO NOON CST WEDNESDAY
